attributes.action: Confer a Knighthood on Ken Dodd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One, if not the greatest Entertainers to come out of Liverpool.  A marvelous Comedian and a true gentleman who has contributed so much to the Merseyside Community.  He has and still does, work tirelessly in his charitable work. He has been honoured by his peers and the City of Liverpool, so its note before time that a Knighthood should be confered upon him.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
